name: Just Keep...
description:
"Just Keep..." 

is a game about... ~swimming~! 

Controls:

  • Use the arrow keys to swim to compete against your fellow swimmers.

After playing, I suggest reading the explanation for why the game was made.

Used sounds from freesound.org:

  • Sadness cosmo by Bruno_ph
  • water by jamiedaniel
  • Swimming at the pool by eksaa
